channel.title: Comments on: The Bitcoin Podcast #214: Dan Boneh

item.title: By: Soof
item.dc:creator: Soof
item.description: what's the ethereum good source of news that you were talking about? Can you eleborate one day on Komodo platform? And if their transactions per second exceeded those of Visa at one point this year? I feel like it's a forgotten about Cryptocurrency and platform, especially when it comes to their atomic swaps, implementation of Z-snarks technology and so forth?
item.content:encoded:
what’s the ethereum good source of news that you were talking about?
Can you eleborate one day on Komodo platform? And if their transactions per second exceeded those of Visa at one point this year? I feel like it’s a forgotten about Cryptocurrency and platform, especially when it comes to their atomic swaps, implementation of Z-snarks technology and so forth?
